name: VNVideoProcessor
desc: An object that performs offline analysis of video content.

items.name: init(url: URL)
items.desc: Creates a video processor to perform Vision requests against the specified video asset.

items.name: func addRequest(VNRequest, processingOptions: VNVideoProcessor.RequestProcessingOptions)
items.desc: Adds a request with processing options to the video processor.

items.name: class VNVideoProcessor.RequestProcessingOptions
items.desc: An object that defines a video processor’s configuration options.

items.name: func removeRequest(VNRequest)
items.desc: Removes a Vision request from the video processor’s request queue.

items.name: func analyze(CMTimeRange)
items.desc: Analyzes a time range of video content.
